long_description:
## mcla_goldberg
Bach's goldberg varations as mineclonia music disks. Powered by the open goldberg
variatons project by Kimiko Ishizaka.

The media files have been reencoded to mono and to a bit- and samplerate of 32k
to achieve a more reasonable media size of 15M vs. the original 47M.

### Credits
Kimiko Ishizaka - https://www.opengoldbergvariations.org/
(CC0 1.0) https://creativecommons.org/public-domain/cc0/
name: mcla_goldberg
short_description: Bach's Goldberg Variations as mineclonia jukebox records and/or tracks for mcla_music_api
title: Mineclonia Goldberg Variations
